CommandDefinition.Name: changepassword
CommandDefinition.Description: Change the password if the given old password is correct.

Argument.Name: userName
Argument.Description: The name of the user for which the password is supposed to be changed

Argument.Name: oldPassword
Argument.Description: The old password with which the existing user is authenticated before the new password is set

Argument.Name: newPassword
Argument.Description: The new password that is set after checking the old one

BoolOption.Name: hashed
BoolOption.Description: If the new password is already hashed, no hashing occurs. (default: false)
